login.title: Sign in to MareWood
login.tip: New to MareWood? Create an account.

register.title: Create your account
register.tip: Already have an account? Go to login ^_^
register.roleTip: Register to get the role of reporter by default

repo.repoBusy: The current warehouse is packaging tasks
repo.deleteDependentFailedTip: The repository status is abnormal and the dependency cannot be deleted
repo.resetRepoSuccess: The backend is rebuilding the repository...
repo.resetRepoFailed: There is a task running in this repository, rebuild repository failed
repo.deleteTitle: Are you sure to delete the repository?
repo.deleteTip: Are you sure you want to delete this repository? No tasks can be deleted using this repository.

category.createTip: Please create a new category first

task.lockTip: Lock tasks and prohibit others from switching branches and packaging
task.accessTip: Can only be accessed after successful packaging
task.lockInputTip: You need to enter a password to unlock or lock
task.deleteTip: Are you sure you want to delete this task?
task.waitBuild: The task is being packed, please wait
task.waitBuildSuccess: Please wait for the task to be packaged
task.unlockTip: The task is locked, please unlock first

dashboard.about: MareWood is an open source automatic packaging deployment tool for front-end
